handleIpcMessage((uint8,((uint64,address.notice: Entrypoint for handling xnet messages in IPC-aware contracts.

documentation.text: @notice Entrypoint for handling xnet messages in IPC-aware contracts.

statements.documentation: Note: if the result handler reverts, we will

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct IpcEnvelope storage pointer,struct IpcEnvelope memory,struct ResultMsg memory)
function (struct IpcEnvelope memory,struct CallMsg memory) returns (bytes memory)

documentation.text:
@notice Function to be overridden by the child contract to handle incoming IPC calls.
 NOTE: It's fine for this method to revert. If that happens, IPC will carry the error to the caller.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct IpcEnvelope memory) payable external returns (struct IpcEnvelope memory)
function (struct IpcEnvelope memory) payable external returns (struct IpcEnvelope memory)

documentation.text: @notice Method the implementation of this contract can invoke to perform an IPC call.
